extends Object

      Given the current step / current step distance remaining, this function will find the current instructions to be shown.

        public RouteUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • isArrivalEvent

        public boolean isArrivalEvent(@NonNull
                              RouteProgress routeProgress)
        Looks at the current RouteProgressState and returns if is RouteProgressState.ROUTE_ARRIVED.
        Parameters:
        routeProgress - the current route progress
        Returns:
        true if in arrival state, false if not

      • isLastLeg

        public boolean isLastLeg(RouteProgress routeProgress)
        Looks at the current RouteProgress list of legs and checks if the current leg is the last leg.
        Parameters:
        routeProgress - the current route progress
        Returns:
        true if last leg, false if not
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • calculateRemainingWaypoints

        @Nullable
public List<com.mapbox.geojson.Point> calculateRemainingWaypoints(RouteProgress routeProgress)
        Given a RouteProgress, this method will calculate the remaining coordinates along the given route based on total route coordinates and the progress remaining waypoints.

        If the coordinate size is less than the remaining waypoints, this method will return null.

        Parameters:
        routeProgress - for route coordinates and remaining waypoints
        Returns:
        list of remaining waypoints as Points
        Since:
        0.10.0

      • calculateRemainingWaypointNames

        @Nullable
public String[] calculateRemainingWaypointNames(RouteProgress routeProgress)
        Given a RouteProgress, this method will calculate the remaining waypoint names along the given route based on route option waypoint names and the progress remaining coordinates.

        If the waypoint names are empty, this method will return null.

        Parameters:
        routeProgress - for route waypoint names and remaining coordinates
        Returns:
        String array including the origin waypoint name and the remaining ones
        Since:
        0.19.0

      • findCurrentBannerInstructions

        @Nullable
public com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.BannerInstructions findCurrentBannerInstructions(com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.LegStep currentStep,
                                                                                                      double stepDistanceRemaining)
        Given the current step / current step distance remaining, this function will find the current instructions to be shown.
        Parameters:
        currentStep - holding the current banner instructions
        stepDistanceRemaining - to determine progress along the currentStep
        Returns:
        the current banner instructions based on the current distance along the step
        Since:
        0.13.0
